title: Naked Journey
description: A lone seafarer by nature, Max agrees to take Alana onboard to help lighten the load of piloting his 45 foot motor cruiser. On a journey along the South American coast, Alana does everything in her power to make Max give in to the powerful chemistry between them. Held back by their past and the difference in their ages, Max exerts all his strength to resist what Alana knows is inevitable.Theirs is a journey in lust and passion that merely begins on the sea, when an unexpected night of hedonistic indulgence becomes the final test of Maxâ€™s willpower. Can one man have the strength to resist the passion of two?
author: Frank Lee
